content: Rather helpfully, there's a brazier by a ledge nearby, and looking down you can find a spot to drop back down to the two bridges we noted at the start of the Lower Hollow, putting you quickly back on track to the main pathway.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Relief of the Fallen Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Rather helpfully, there's a brazier by a ledge nearby, and looking down you can find a spot to drop back down to the two bridges we noted at the start of the Lower Hollow, putting you quickly back on track to the main pathway.
